scripts.coveralls: istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- --recursive -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage
scripts.test-win: SET DEBUG=parkify* && istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- --recursive -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage
scripts.test: DEBUG='parkify*' && istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- --recursive -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage
